It is been around four weeks since we left.
If we do not hurry, there will be serious trouble.
What do you think is up with Kakyoin?
He was flailing around in his sleep on the plane, and now he looks like this.
He even went after the baby.
I think he is at his wit's end.
I do not know if he can continue this journey.
I panicked back there, thinking Kakyoin had figured out who I am...
And we are in the middle of the desert.
Now, I just have to wait until they are all asleep.
If there is no one to wake them up...
This is milk, egg yolks, bananas, and bread all stewed together.
I could totally go for this!
There will not be any left for the baby.
Mr. Joestar, Polnareff, did you see that?!
That baby is not normal after all!
In the blink of an eye!
He stabbed it with a safety pin!
That is not a normal baby!
He is not even a year old, but knew what a scorpion was...
And he killed it with those tiny hands!
The dead scorpion on the pin should be in here.
I said this earlier, but you are tired.
Let us talk again tomorrow morning, after you have calmed down.
I am sure you are hungry, but you do not want any?
There is a reason I cannot eat right now!
I am sure of it now!
I do not know where he hid the scorpion, but he is a Stand user!
And I have the very thing to prove that!
Look at the wound on my arm!
This must be a wound I got in my sleep.
Kakyoin, did you do that to yourself?
Did not you realize that if you showed them that, they would think you were a fool?!
D-Did they misunderstand me even more?
I will have to use force!
He is totally lost his mind.
His Stand was the one in our dreams, Polnareff.
We cannot fall asleep, Mr. Joestar.
If we fall asleep, we will be killed.
I got away without being found out!
You lost to your own disbelief in your friend!
It is my victory, you fools!
So Kakyoin cannot fight or travel with us anymore?
We will figure out what to do with him in the morning.
Now I can slice you all up and scatter your remains all over the desert!
Why are we in sleeping bags at an amusement park, like a bunch of idiots?
This is a world of nightmares!
Oh, so it is just a dream.
Then I am just going to relax.
Do not have the same reaction I did!
What Kakyoin was saying is true!
I know it is hard to believe, but the Stand user is that baby!
There is no one to wake you up now.
So there is absolutely no way for you to escape Death 13's world.
Now I will finally finish you all.
Since I made Kakyoin pass out,
he should already be somewhere in this world.
I have to apologize to him.
P-Polnareff, what is with your hairstyle?
Did you mess up styling it?
How are we supposed to fight this?
There are no rules or logic.
It is a world where we are at his mercy!
We cannot bring our Stands into the dream world!
And dreams are the spirit unguarded!
Death 13 has surrounded that unguarded spirit,
and that is why you cannot summon your Stands!
summoned your Stands before you fell asleep,
you could have brought them with you, like the clothes you are wearing,
the sleeping bags, and the artificial hand.
Death 13 will never have to face another Stand!
And the only thing that can defeat a Stand is another Stand,
How about you give me a scream?
One that symbolizes how happy and refreshed I feel at my easy victory!
Oh, it is just the fake one I made.
did you forget that I had Hierophant out?
I had Hierophant hide underground before I fell asleep.
Now, it is time for your punishment, baby.
He is completely in your blind spot.
Even if you are just a baby, your neck will be broken.
I thought you might have become weak-minded.
I could not believe in you.
You were fighting this battle alone...
I only figured out a way to bring my Stand
with me into the dream after you hit me.
So in a way, this is all thanks to you.
I-I cannot help but feel a bit conflicted.
He is holding back because I am a baby...
Kakyoin, your naivete will cost your life!
You are still inside my nightmare world!
Hey, what is with the clouds?
Get Hierophant away from his back!
I will chop you in half!
Death 13 is just the head, arms, and the giant scythe.
Kakyoin's body should also be split in two inside the sleeping bag.
My Hierophant is not so careless as to stay on his back forever.
He is not chopped in half!
He is taken on a string-like form...
And he is crawling into my ear!
M-My arm is moving on its own...
He was in your blind spot,
so your scythe could not touch him.
Now, if you do not wish to be destroyed from within...
How about you heal this wound on my arm?
so I am sure you can heal a cut, right?
I feel like I had a terrible dream...
I cannot remember it, but I still feel like it was terrifying.
You were totally deranged last night!
You even carved letters into your arm...
Now, I will just go change the baby's diaper.
He seems to be getting along with the baby,
so maybe I was just dreaming...
A Stand whose existence is completely forgotten...
I am the only one who brought a Stand into the dream.
I will not mortally wound you, or injure you at all.
We will take you to a nearby town.
You need to go back to your mother.
But do not ever come near us again.
If you do, I will punish you.
You even made some baby food?
I am sure you must be hungry by now.
I wonder what he is got against this stuff...
At this rate, I will have to force-feed him.
If you force him, he will just hate it more.
Joestar and the others have now crossed the Arabian Peninsula,
and are currently crossing the Red Sea, about to enter Egypt.
You are going the wrong way.
Should not you be heading directly west, to Egypt?
You seem to be heading toward that island.
I have my reasons for not telling you before,
but before we enter Egypt, we need to make a slight detour and meet someone.
He is a man who is extremely important to this journey.
I am the one who let Avdol die.
There is no way I can make up for that.
To thank you for freeing me from the lamp...
Can you bring someone back to life?
